The §6Planet ID Chip§r is used in the §6Guidance Computer§r to tell the rocket §ewhat planet it should go to§r. These §6ID Chip§rs can also be §eduplicated in a §6Satellite Builder§r. Learn more in it's own quest description.

To craft one, you'll simply need two §6Basic Circuit§rs and a §6Satellite ID Chip§r (§7which can be made using only one Basic Circuit§r).
